name: TD2S
description:
Basically, this is a "rebuild" of TDS with wildly customizable weapons. And while it does have a much better architecture, it still lacks a lot of things, such as:

  • Different enemy types
  • Campaign
  • Better UI with drag'n'drop
  • Upgrading/swapping of modifiers
  • Sounds
  • Balance
  • Moar modifiers!

All of which I will definitely add, maybe.
